B-Links

  • CSS Text Effects - A Collection, by Mandy Michael, of impressive CSS text Effects
  • 12 Factor CLI Apps - Useful tips for creating CLI commands
  • Teach, Don't Tell - A fantastic, lengthy post on good documentation.
  • Bulma - A modern CSS framework based on Flexbox. Looks good
  • GramTest: A tool for Grammar based Test case generation
  • Event Sourcing: Eventual Consistency and Responding to Events - The 3rd part in an excellent series on Event Sourcing.
  • The Dark Standup - Great idea
  • Let’s Stop Ascribing Meaning to Code Points - They are NOT characters. Do NOT treat them as such.
  • Performant Parallaxing - Non-JS, smooth parallax scrolling.
  • Use the Unofficial Bash Strict Mode - Good advice for using Bash

Happenings

Real Connections

So, for my first update, I thought it would be nice to connect myself to the rest of the world. If you look at the navigation bar, you’ll see a small button that says GeoURL. If you click it, you’ll get a list of blogs that have registered with GeoURL and are geographically close to me. There’s something odd about making meta-physical connections to physical places. But click on it anyway.

New Site Soon

Welcome to my new site. No, it’s not the site that I’ve been building for months now; it’s the one that I’ve spent the last day or so building. Don’t expect too much from it. It’s primary function is to enable me to update people on various projects, including my new site. It’s more of a blog-style mini-site. As it’s early days, it will have a bug or two. Should you spot one, please contact me and it will be fixed. Keep coming back for more.

Yes, that’s right. The brand spanking new VKPS.co.uk will be rocking your world in the shortest time imaginable. A new design, new features, new structure, updated more frequently. This version will be the ultimate version. Until the next one at least.
